author: m.kalinin
content: Probably someone has already mentioned that but light client couldn't participate in any gossip topics due to lack of resources to check all the validity conditions. Honest light client will never propagate a block. Thus, there are two options for them, listen to gossipsub topic and doesn't participate in dissemination or use req/resp to request blocks. The latter is inconvenient, the former weakens BFT properties of the mesh.
